trans-unit.source: Defines the base class for resources that can be added to an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Define la clase base para los recursos que se pueden agregar a un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource> derived types to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo agregar <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource> a los tipos derivados un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Commits all changes and flushes the resource to the document package.
trans-unit.target: Confirma todos los cambios y vacía el recurso en el paquete del documento.

trans-unit.source: Based on settings of <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, the flush operation of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> method may be delayed until the whole <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Basado en valores de <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> y <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, como <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> y <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, la operación de vaciado de los <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> método podría retrasarse hasta que todo el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> se cierra.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> method (in a derived class) when you add resources to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> (método) (en una clase derivada) al agregar recursos a un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the I/O stream for reading or writing the resource.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se invalida en una clase derivada, devuelve la secuencia de E/S para leer o escribir el recurso.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> for reading or writing the resource.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> para leer o escribir el recurso.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method (in a derived class) to add resources to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar este método (en una clase derivada) para agregar recursos a un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource that is relative to a specified absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del recurso relativo a un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] absoluto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the resource that is relative to the specified absolute <paramref name="inUri" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> del recurso que es relativo al <paramref name="inUri" /> absoluto especificado.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the Windows Presentation Foundation infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro admite la infraestructura de Windows Presentation Foundation y no está previsto su uso directo desde el código.
